titleStmt.title: The Christian souldiers great engine, or The mysterious and mighty workings of faith, discovered in a sermon preached before the Lord Generall in Oxford, May 20. 1649. By John Maudit Fellow of Exeter Colledge, and senior proctor of the University.
titleStmt.author: Maudit, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield, printer to the University,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
